home.subtitle: Creating innovative mobile applications for users worldwide
home.description: Bitsquid creates innovative mobile applications for users worldwide. Our goal is to develop unique digital experiences that connect, inspire, and provide real value. Discover Lunts, our college dating app with exclusive benefits for students.

about.title: About Bitsquid
about.description1: We are passionate about creating innovative mobile applications that transform how people connect and interact in the digital world. Our team combines cutting-edge technology with user-centered design to deliver exceptional experiences.
about.description2: From college dating apps to enterprise solutions, we build products that matter and make a real difference in people's lives.

innovation.title: Innovation First
innovation.description: We leverage the latest technologies and design trends to create cutting-edge mobile applications that stand out in the market.

userCentered.title: User-Centered Design
userCentered.description: Every decision we make is driven by user needs and feedback, ensuring our applications provide exceptional user experiences.

security.title: Security & Privacy
security.description: We prioritize user privacy and data security, implementing industry-leading practices to protect our users' information.

bitsquid.title: Bitsquid Innovation
bitsquid.description: Leading the future of mobile applications with cutting-edge technology and user-centered design.

lunts.title: Lunts
lunts.subtitle: College Dating App
lunts.description: Find your perfect match with Lunts! Connect with other students and create meaningful relationships. Whether you're looking for love, friendship, or something in between, Lunts helps you find like-minded people in your university environment. Plus, enjoy exclusive benefits designed for students. Download Lunts now and start your journey to new experiences and unforgettable connections!

university.title: University-focused matching
university.description: Connect with students from your university and nearby campuses. Our algorithm focuses on academic compatibility and shared interests.

benefits.title: Exclusive student benefits
benefits.description: Enjoy exclusive student discounts, free premium features, and special offers from partner businesses near your campus.

safety.title: Safe and verified environment
safety.description: Your safety is our priority. All profiles are verified through university email addresses and our advanced security system.

events.title: Campus events integration
events.description: Stay connected with campus life through integrated event notifications and social activities with other students.

downloadSection.title: Download Lunts Today
downloadSection.description: Available on all major platforms. Start your university dating journey now!

jobs.title: Career Opportunities
jobs.description: We're always looking for talented individuals to join our team. Check back soon for new opportunities!

footer.description: Creating innovative mobile applications for users worldwide.

privacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
privacyPolicy.intro: Thank you for using Lunts, a dating application that connects people with common interests. We are committed to protecting your privacy and personal information. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your information when you use our services.

items.title: Registration Information:
items.content: When you register on Lunts, we collect personal information such as your name, email address, and date of birth. You can also choose to register using authentication services like Facebook, Google, or your phone number. We do not store your passwords directly, as these are managed through the corresponding authentication services.

items.title: Profile Information:
items.content: You may provide additional information on your profile, such as photographs, personal description, location, and search preferences.

items.title: Location Information:
items.content: With your consent, we collect information about your geographic location to provide location-based features, such as searching for nearby users.

items.title: Advertising Information:
items.content: We collect information about interactions with ads displayed in the application, such as clicks, views, and actions taken in response to ads.

useOfInformation.title: 2. Use of Your Information:
items: We use your information to provide you with our services, including matching profiles, facilitating communications between users, and enhancing the overall app experience.
We may use your information to personalize your experience on Lunts by showing you profiles and content we believe may interest you.
We use the collected information to improve and optimize our services, as well as for internal analysis and the development of new features.
We only send informational or promotional emails if you opt-in to receive them within the application.

sharingInformation.title: 3. Sharing Your Information:
sharingInformation.intro: We do not share your personal information with unaffiliated third parties except in the following circumstances:
items: When necessary to provide our services and operate the application, including the use of third-party service providers.
When required by law or in response to legal processes.

informationSecurity.title: 4. Information Security:
items: We implement appropriate technical and organizational security measures to protect your information against unauthorized access, disclosure, or alteration.
Your chats with other users are encrypted and stored locally on your devices, and we do not have access to them.

internationalTransfers.title: 5. International Transfers:
internationalTransfers.content: By using our services, you agree that your information may be transferred and processed in countries outside of your country of residence.

minors.title: 6. Minors:
minors.content: Lunts is not directed to individuals under the age of 18, and we do not knowingly collect personal information from minors.

reportingModeration.title: 7. Reporting and Moderation:
reportingModeration.content: We provide a reporting option to report profiles that violate our policies, such as fake profiles, inappropriate behavior, or inappropriate content.

childSafety.title: 8. Child Safety and Child Sexual Abuse Exploitation (EASI) Standards:
childSafety.intro: At Lunts, we take the protection of minors and the compliance with laws related to child sexual abuse and exploitation (EASI) very seriously. We are committed to:
items: Implementing child safety standards and taking action against content related to child sexual abuse.
Providing a mechanism within the app for users to report any concerns related to child safety.
Working with relevant authorities when incidents related to child exploitation and abuse are identified.
Complying with all local and international child safety laws.
For more information or to report any child safety concerns, please contact our child safety contact at lunts.info@gmail.com.

contact.title: 9. Contact:
contact.content: If you have any questions, concerns, or comments about this Privacy Policy or our privacy practices in general, feel free to contact us at lunts.info@gmail.com.

privacyPolicy.agreement: By using Lunts, you agree to the terms and conditions set forth in this Privacy Policy. We recommend that you review this policy periodically to stay informed about how we protect your information.

contact.title: Contact Information
contact.content: If you have any questions about these Privacy Policy, please feel free to contact us at lunts.info@gmail.com.

termsConditions.title: Terms and Conditions of Use for Lunts
termsConditions.intro: Please read these Terms and Conditions carefully before using the Lunts mobile application and its related services. By accessing or using the application, you agree to be legally bound by these terms and conditions.

useOfApp.title: 1. Use of the Application:
content: By using the Lunts application, you agree that you are at least 18 years old and have the legal capacity to enter into a binding contract.
You agree to use the application responsibly and in accordance with these terms and conditions, as well as all applicable laws and regulations.

registration.title: 2. Registration and Accounts:
content: To access certain features of the application, you may need to register and create an account. You must provide accurate and complete information during the registration process.
You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account and password, and you agree to notify us immediately of any unauthorized use of your account.

userConduct.title: 3. User Conduct:
content: You agree not to use the application for illegal, fraudulent, abusive, or inappropriate activities.
You may not use the application to harass, intimidate, defame, or violate the privacy rights of other users.

userContent.title: 4. User Content:
content: You are solely responsible for the content you share through the application, including your photographs, descriptions, and messages.
You agree not to post content that is obscene, pornographic, defamatory, discriminatory, or that violates the intellectual property rights of third parties.

intellectualProperty.title: 5. Intellectual Property:
content: The Lunts application and all its contents, including but not limited to text, graphics, logos, images, and software, are protected by copyright and other intellectual property laws.
You may not reproduce, distribute, modify, or create derivative works based on the content of the application without our express consent.

advertising.title: 6. Advertising:
content: You agree that the Lunts application may display advertisements to non-premium accounts.
Advertisements may be provided by third-party advertisers and may be subject to additional privacy policies and terms and conditions.

premiumAccount.title: 7. Premium Account and Payments:
content: By purchasing a premium account on Lunts, you agree to pay all applicable fees and abide by the following additional terms:
After the discount applied in the first subscription, the renewal will be charged at the full subscription amount without any discount.
The subscription will automatically renew at the end of each subscription period unless canceled.
Your account will be charged upon subscribing and then at each renewal. The amounts charged each time will be as indicated for the subscription period you choose within the application.

You can cancel anytime through the Lunts application, via the store, or by emailing lunts.info@gmail.com. To avoid being charged for subscription renewal, you must cancel at least one day before the renewal date.

If you cancel within 48 hours of subscribing, you must email lunts.info@gmail.com requesting a refund. A full refund will be issued if the request is made within this 48-hour period. No refunds will be issued after this period.

modifications.title: 8. Modifications and Termination:
content: We reserve the right to modify, suspend, or terminate the application or any part of it at any time and without prior notice.
We reserve the right to terminate your access to the application if we believe you have violated these terms and conditions in any way.

liability.title: 9. Limitation of Liability:
content: To the maximum extent permitted by applicable law, we disclaim any liability for direct, indirect, incidental, special, or consequential damages arising from the use or inability to use the application.

applicableLaw.title: 10. Applicable Law:
content: These terms and conditions shall be governed and construed in accordance with the laws of the countries in which we operate, without regard to their conflict of law provisions.

contact.title: Contact Information
contact.content: If you have any questions about these Terms and Conditions, please feel free to contact us at lunts.info@gmail.com.
contact.agreement: By using the Lunts application, you agree to these Terms and Conditions in their entirety. If you do not agree with any of these terms, please refrain from using the application.
